article_title: Darrell Issa to Jonathan Gruber: 'Are you stupid?'
article_text: - Members of the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform grilled Jonathan Gruber, an MIT economist and former adviser on the Affordable Care Act, for controversial comments he made about the law. ()
